item.description:
1. Nvidia's new app is making PC games run up to 15% slower — here's how to fix it  Tom's Guide
  2. We tested the Nvidia App performance problems — games can run up to 15 percent slower with the app (Updated)  Tom's Hardware
  3. NVIDIA shares fix for game performance issues with new NVIDIA App  BleepingComputer
  4. Nvidia’s new app is causing large frame rate dips in many games  Ars Technica
  5. Nvidia's new PC gaming app is making games run worse, but there's a quick fix  Mashable
